column5: Looking at taking my son camping next weekend .. looking to go somewhere we haven't been before .. has anyone been to Wheatley before?? .. is there a boat launch close by? .. I am not familiar with the area at all so any fishing tips would be great too .. thanks
Not sure about the local boat launch other than the Colchester area a little farther along.  There are a few inland ponds within the park that hold lots of catfish.  Cheers  Craig
Thanks sandbag .. I will be sure to bring some catfish stuff with me .. hoping to get out in the big lake for some eyes if its not too breezy
wheatley has a good ramp and great fishing. hopefully the perch are there. its an incredible fishing. steelhead, walleyes and jumbo perch.

A fifteen minute drive west puts you in Leamington. There is a very well maintained marina and if you head back east a little once you get into the big lake there is usually some really good fishing in front of the golf course.
Thanks guys .. herd from a guy at work the silvers are in around the Detroit river .. if the lakes too rough at least I have an option to keep the boy happy
